name: The Death Dream
description:
In this game you play as a Guardian and defend a kid from the doom demons in his dreams.

Story: It's been a long time staying and suffering in that dream. The kid was unable to win that dream. The demons overtook the kid's mind.

The kid ask for help from God. 

Now playing as the guardian would you be able to take the kid's soul to his sleeping body.

Remember: You can't kill zombies but they can kill you.

Cinematics:

Game contains some cool cinematic in the starting of the game and in the end.. Enjoy the game.

*This game is officially developed for Epic Mega Jam 2020 and by a solo developer.
